title: Dark Lance
summaries: The Dark Lance is a pre-Hardmode, post-Skeletron spear that can pierce through enemies, capable of hitting the same enemy multiple times. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the Dark Lance inflicts the Shadowflame(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) debuff for 4â€“5 seconds and creates a small, damaging shockwave at the end of its tip, further extending its reach. The Dark Lance has a (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 1/5 (20%) / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 1/6 (16.67%) chance of being found in Shadow Chests in the Underworld, as well as a 1/5 (20%) chance of being found in Obsidian Lock Boxes(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) obtained from Obsidian Crates(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) and Hellstone Crates(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions).
When used, the Dark Lance gives off light-emitting particles that linger for a while. It is the strongest <linked>pre-Hardmode</linked> spear.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.
